title: Marvel Rivals is bringing muscle mommy Angela and super saiyan Daredevil to the roster
description: Season 4 can be your angel(a)... or your (dare)devil.
content:
The next season of Marvel Rivals will bring two new heroes to the team-based shooter: Angela and Daredevil. Developer NetEase Games confirmed Marvel Rivals' season 4 additions in a dynamic new animated trailer, one that also confirms that Angela will be absolutely jacked in the game. Damn.

While the trailer for Marvel Rivals season 4 doesn't reveal much about how either character will play, it certainly implies that Angela is a Vanguard-class hero, based on her lats alone. But hopefully Matt Murdock going Super Saiyan in the trailer is an indication that the Man Without Fear will have an interesting twist to his gameplay.

We'll find out soon enough. Marvel Rivals season 4, aka The Heart of the Dragon, will launch on Sept. 12. If you've been keeping up with the story, here's where it's going, according to the trailer's official description:

The Timestream Entanglement has drawn the Seven Capitals together, forming the Heart of Heaven. After Knull’s fall, Hela is imprisoned in the An'Hay-Zhidi, where Dizang—Devil of the Eighth City—dares her to atone for her sins. But Angela will not forgive her betrayal. She arrives in the Heart of Heaven demanding Hela be handed over, yet its guardian refuses to surrender someone under his protection. Justice will be served and a debt will be paid. But while they fight, an even greater danger stirs. Doctor Doom seeks to steal the Chronal Chi of the slumbering dragon Shou-Lao, threatening to unravel the fate of the Heavens themselves. Can Iron Fist protect the Immortal Dragon… or will Doom claim its power?

Angela's history in Marvel Comics is an interesting one. Originally created by Neil Gaiman and Todd McFarlane for the Spawn universe in 1993, a legal dispute between Angela's creators wound up transporting her to the Marvel universe in 2013, where she was re-canonized to be Thor's sister.

Marvel Rivals is available now on PlayStation 5, Windows PC, and Xbox Series X. As NetEase Games' new trailer confirms, it's also coming to PlayStation 4.
summary: The next season of Marvel Rivals will bring two new heroes, Angela and Daredevil, confirmed by developer NetEase Games. The character descriptions suggest that Angela will be a Vanguard-class hero based on her body. The season 4 episode, "The Heart of the Dragon," will launch on September 12. The game is currently available on PlayStation 5, Windows PC, and Xbox Series X.
shortSummary: The next season of Marvel Rivals will feature new heroes Angela and Daredevil, and will debut on September 12.
